title: Electric field near two point charges

content.description: A particle with a charge -Q is located a distance D from a particle with a charge +2Q, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Which of the following best describes the location of a point, other than at infinity, at which the net electric field created by the two charges is equal to zero?

choices.label: In region II, midway between the charges

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
